paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Arg-83, including penetrance data and individual case details.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Both of the patients in the report had floaters and progressive vision loss for years.
Both of the patients in the report had floaters and progressive vision loss for years.

functional_data.summary: The variant results in an amino acid substitution at position 83, glycine to arginine.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was identified through bi-directional sequencing of the TTR gene.
key_quotes: The vitreous specimens were subjected to histopathological examination.
The specimens showed typical microscopic features of amyloidosis with Congo red stain.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
